attr.title: Gyro Boss DX
attr.desc: Your home planet is under siege from a band of intergalactic pirates led by the fiendish Gyro Boss! Dodge an endless assault of weapons as you orbit around the boss on a fixed circle, it's not as easy as it looks. Can you secure bragging rights as the best space pilot to bite the dust against the alien menace?
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam or Itch.io and place all game files into the assets folder.
